solution_line_template: Her children ate {children_eat_percent_text}% of the {initial_total_brownies} brownies so they ate {children_eat_percent_decimal}*{initial_total_brownies} = <<{children_eat_percent_text}*{percent_factor}*{initial_total_brownies}={children_eaten_brownies}>>{children_eaten_brownies} slices

The family ate {family_eat_percent_text}% of the remaining {brownies_after_children} brownies so they ate {family_eat_percent_decimal}*{brownies_after_children} = <<{family_eat_percent_text}*{percent_factor}*{brownies_after_children}={family_eaten_brownies}>>{family_eaten_brownies} brownies

There were {brownies_after_children} brownies and they ate {family_eaten_brownies} which leaves {brownies_after_children}-{family_eaten_brownies} = <<{brownies_after_children}-{family_eaten_brownies}={brownies_after_family}>>{brownies_after_family} brownies
